mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.name, a.href, a.is_pay, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent.name"
LEFT JOIN pc_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select: select * from pc_menu where parent_id = #{id} ORDER BY sort

SELECT
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pc_menu AS B WHERE a.id = B.parent_id AND B.del_flag=0) AS 'num' FROM pc_menu a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM pc_menu a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pc_menu AS B WHERE a.id = B.parent_id AND B.del_flag=0) AS 'num'
FROM pc_menu a LEFT JOIN pc_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN pc_menu_role rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN pc_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id JOIN pc_user_role ur ON ur.pc_role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pc_menu AS B WHERE a.id = B.parent_id AND B.del_flag=0) AS 'num' FROM pc_menu a
WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.parent_id = #{id} ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pc_menu( parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, is_pay, icon, sort, is_show, permission, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{isPay}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pc_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, is_pay = #{isPay}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM pc_menu WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
UPDATE pc_menu SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
